Articles.Content:
Unless I'm missing something it seems that you can't complete a part test contract by activating the part with an action group, it has to be activated via staging.

Is this intended functionality or is it a bug?
It says in the contract the conditions under which the contract is completed, and all the part testing ones i've seen have said "activated by staging," so it must be intended
It seems kind of silly that you HAVE to put it into staging...
ah, I just noticed, while testing the LV-1 engine, I was able to right click on the engine and click "run test".

Not all of them stage. I had one to test the plane Landing gear. After furiously clicking the deploy great button and not getting results., I right clicked the part and it had a new option of "test part" most have been done secret military thing because they weren't testing the landing functionality for sure
